Welcome to AppXGen

üß± Powerful Blocks

There are 92 well designed and heavily functional blocks from the Tailblocks project.


üèû Assets Uploading

Stores the images uploaded in the editor in your repo. Displays them when needed on production.


üÉè Delightful Builder

Powered by Grapes.js, a flexible and feature-full editor with CSS like options similar to Webflow.


üïπ Data Ownership

AppXGen stores all your assets on Github, Bitbucket etc through the editor. There are no external dependencies to manage or worry about.


üë©üèª‚Äçüíª Developer Ready

Works out of the box with any Next.js project. Build a few landing pages with AppXGen and the rest of your app with the usuall Next.js toolkit.


üèÉüèΩ Instant Deployment

AppXGen supports environment detection. The visual editor comes up only in development and the compiled version on production.


üì∏ Easy Setup

Click the Deploy button below to create a new AppXGen project on Vercel or head to Installing the plugin for instructions for your existing Next.js projects.
